items.summary: Remove the "Intake" top-level navigation item from the header so the primary navigation is Billing-focused and no "Intake" menu entry is shown anywhere in the Header UI.

Remove all Patient Intake/Intake promotional content from the Home (dashboard/landing) page so the dashboard presents a Billing-only experience (e.g., remove the Intake CTA button/link, remove the Intake service card/section, and remove intake-related marketing copy).

Remove the Intake route from the app routing configuration so the Intake page is not part of the navigable application flow; ensure that directly visiting "/intake" does not present the Intake page content (redirect to "/billing" or show a not-found style outcome).
